summary: Here they are! Jitch, Pixie and Jozzbo in skyrim! (ALSO INCLUDES OUR FRIEND DHARC)
descriptionHtml:
I am starting to try out Skyrim modding and for my first task I decided to get some NPCs created!
So here they are!

These are the NPCs and thier locations:

Jitch Dragonbane: This one is based on myself. He is located by the cow in Whiterun!
Forest Pixie: Based on Ollie! This little fella is in the Whiterun courtyard!
Jozzbo The Assassin: Based on Jack! He is in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun!
Dharc: Based on our friend Sam from DharcIndusties! He is in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun!

If you like this then you may like to see who we are!
We are on Youtube:
Our Gaming Channel: http://www.youtube.com/JOJCrew
Our vlogging Channel: http://www.youtube.com/JOJVlogs
Dharc\'s Channel: http://www.youtube.com/DharcIndustries

Our Website: http://www.jojcrew.co.uk
Our store: http://jojcrew.spreadshirt.co.uk


(CAUTION: Contains one use of naughty language *giggle*)
author: Jitch
